DOC.brief_summary: Patients prospectively randomize 3 different treatment arm : - Treatment group 1 : patient undergo medial temporal lobe resection - Treatment group 2 : patient receive immediate hippocampal neurostimulation - Treatment group 3 : patient implanted intracranial electrode hippocampal neurostimulation delay 6 month . Twelve month inclusion unblinding occur . Patients group 2 3 option choose continue neurostimulation treatment resective surgery . Study visit occur every 3 month .
DOC.brief_title: Controlled Randomized Stimulation Versus Resection ( CoRaStiR )
